txt.en: Varthmath can be found in the Gladdenmere.\n\nYou should bring the medallions to Varthmath.
Stone-giants can be found on the northern edge of the Gladdenmere.\n\nYou should collect medallions from the stone-giants you defeat in the Gladdenmere.

Many of the stone-giants that walk the Gladdenmere wear medallions of polished stone. These crafted discs would be greatly prized by Grimbeorn or the other Wilderfolk of the Vales of Anduin. You should collect some of these medallions from any stone-giants you defeat.
Stone-giants can be found on the northern edge of the Gladdenmere.\n\nYou should collect medallions from the stone-giants you defeat in the Gladdenmere.
Stone-giants of the Gladdenmere wear crafted medallions upon their necks. These polished stones are much prized by the Beornings of the Vales.
'Ah, fine trophies, indeed! Grimbeorn and the Wilderfolk will be proud to bear these medallions. Our work in the Gladdenmere grows closer to its end. You have done well!'
Bring the medallions to Varthmath in the Gladdenmere
